modmenu.descriptionTranslation.obs_overl: Hide HUD elements from OBS stream by making them an overlay.
obs_overlay.config.title: OBS Overlay Settings
obs_overlay.config.components_to_overlay: Select components to hide from OBS:
Selected components will be rendered as an overlay, and therefore hidden from OBS' game capture
obs_overlay.config.auto_hide_components: Select components to hide when any interface is open:
Since hidden components are rendered as an overlay, they might still be visible on top of any interface.
Selected components will be hidden completely when any interface is open
obs_overlay.config.requires_overlay_enab: Requires '%s' to be hidden from OBS
obs_overlay.config.show_test_icon: Show test icon in the top left corner
obs_overlay.config.show_test_icon.toolti:
This will enable a test icon that will be visible anywhere but hidden in the stream.
You can use it to quickly check if overlay components are not visible
obs_overlay.component.debug_menu.tooltip: An F3 menu containing debug information including coordinates, chunk information, etc
obs_overlay.component.chat.tooltip: Chat messages excluding the input field
obs_overlay.component.chat_bar.tooltip: Chat input field with autocomplete suggestions
obs_overlay.component.player_list.toolti: A player list displayed when pressing TAB
obs_overlay.component.subtitles.tooltip:
Audio subtitles displayed in the right lower corner
Disabled by default, can be enabled in accessibility settings
obs_overlay.component.scoreboards.toolti:
A score table located on the right side of the screen.
Can be set using /scoreboard command
obs_overlay.component.actionbar.tooltip:
A message displayed above the hotbar.
Can be set using /title @p actionbar
obs_overlay.component.title_subtitle.too:
A big message displayed in the middle of the screen.
Can be set using /title @p title and /title @p subtitle
obs_overlay.component.effects.tooltip: Potion effects displayed in the top right corner of the screen
obs_overlay.component.main_hud.tooltip: Main HUD elements including hotbar, health, hunger, armor, experience, etc
